runs.name: strategy_maker
runs.task_description: Generate rerun_strategy_class.json in the blocks/attempts schema for all class generator runs found in runs_class.json. For each target_run, emit (refiner) block with 2 identical attempts using py_refiner.json and context_files [manifest, class_file, validation_report, python_rules], and (remake) block with 1 attempt using py_generator.json and context_files copied from the original generator run.
